arts.ttl: Ligue 1 Predictions | Round 11: PSG look to return to winning ways against OGC Nice
arts.sum: Ligue 1 Predictions, Round 11 GFFN editor-in-chief Luke Entwistle, and sub-editors Raphaël Jucobin and Bastien Cheval face off in our Ligue 1 predictions competition. This season, GFFN will also be hosting guests. Earlier this season, The Athletic’s Alex Barker participated and became…

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – The Parisian lineup is expected to be without Dembélé, but with a major return
arts.sum: This Saturday, Paris Saint-Germain faces Nice at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season (kick-off at 5 pm, CET). This Friday, Le Parisien published a probable PSG lineup. Barcola – Mayulu – Kvaratskhelia Lee – Vitinha – Neves Hernandez – Pacho – Zabarnyi – Hakimi Chevalier. This is a […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Luis Enrique in press conference: injuries, rest, “fear” and defense
arts.sum: On Saturday, during Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Nice (8th) at the Parc des Princes (kick-off at 5 p.m., CET). On the eve of this match, PSG coach Luis Enrique answered several questions at a press conference. Luis Enrique: “We’re in first place, we mustn’t forget that, […]
